channel.title: Zach Dyer Design
channel.description: Zach Dyer Design LLC is a full service web design company located in Ozark, Missouri in the Carl Hefner Business Enterprise. We provide web design, branding design, web programming, domain and hosting services.

item.title: Brik Masonry
item.description: When Zach Dyer talked to Brik with Brik Masonry on the phone, Brik said he had just talked to his wife about getting a website. Brik hired Zach Dyer Design to design his website and an online employment application so that applicants can apply online for his masonry company.

item.title: Missouri Tile
item.description: The largest tile company in Southwest Missouri with 5000 square foot showroom hired Zach Dyer Design to design a company logo and site. The site is live at MissouriTile.biz.

item.title: Born To Bore
item.description: When Zach Dyer Design and L & B Services were Located at the Carl G. Hefner Enterprise Center L & B hired Zach Dyer Design to design there website. After the site went live the client got a call in 20 minutes!

item.title: Tope Insurance
item.description: After Julie Tope with Tope Insurance met Zach Dyer at the Elks Lodge in Ozark, Missouri, Julie hired Zach to build her website and manage her email service. Julie has been doing business with Zach Dyer Design since 2011.

item.title: South Law
item.description: A large law firm in Kansas City with over 90 attorneys on staff hired Zach Dyer Design to build a website for their company brand.

item.title: Heard Dentistry
item.description: Heard Professional Dentistry contacted and hired Zach Dyer Design to program a website based on a finished design.
